Name: Shubman Gill
Teams: Punjab, India U19, India U23, India A, Kolkata Knight Riders, India B, India, India C, India Blue
Bio: A right-h top-order batsman from Punjab,Shubman Gill is known for his penchant for big runs  was hence drafted into India Under-19 side as the vice-captain for the 2018 World Cup,He made his first-class debut before that,for Punjab in the Ranji Trophy in late 2017 with a half-century in the game  an attacking 129 in the next match
